name: Vignettes
description: Vignettes is a unique exploration game without text or characters, where objects shapeshift as you spin them around to wander through a kaleidoscope of different moods and settings.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 GHz 64bit Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
